verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> But Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

מֶה־ <WH4100> What עָזַ֥רְתָּ <WH5826> How hast thou helped לְלֹא־ <WH3808> [that hath] no כֹ֑חַ <WH3581> ability ה֝וֹשַׁ֗עְתָּ <WH3467> have saved זְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> thou the arm לֹא־ <WH3808> without עֹֽז׃ <WH5797> strength

מַה־ <WH4100> What יָּ֭עַצְתָּ <WH3289> How hast thou counselled לְלֹ֣א <WH3808> [him that hath] no חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> wisdom וְ֝תוּשִׁיָּ֗ה <WH8454> helpful לָרֹ֥ב <WH7230> have abundantly הוֹדָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH3045> declared

אֶת־ <WH854> for מִ֭י <WH4310> to whom הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <WH5046> To whom hast thou uttered מִלִּ֑ין <WH4405> answer וְנִשְׁמַת־ <WH5397> spirit מִ֝י <WH4310> to whom יָצְאָ֥ה <WH3318> came מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> through
הָרְפָאִ֥ים <WH7496> Dead יְחוֹלָ֑לוּ <WH2342> [things] are formed מִתַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Under מַ֝֗יִם <WH4325> from under the waters וְשֹׁכְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH7931> and the inhabitants
עָר֣וֹם <WH6174> [is] naked שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> Hell נֶגְדּ֑וֹ <WH5048> before וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> has כְּ֝ס֗וּת <WH3682> hath no covering לָֽאֲבַדּֽוֹן׃ <WH11> before him and destruction

נֹטֶ֣ה <WH5186> He stretcheth out צָפ֣וֹן <WH6828> the north עַל־ <WH5921> over תֹּ֑הוּ <WH8414> over the empty place תֹּ֥לֶה <WH8518> [and] hangeth אֶ֝֗רֶץ <WH776> the earth עַל־ <WH5921> over בְּלִי־ <WH1099> upon nothing מָֽה׃ <WH4100> He

צֹרֵֽר־ <WH6887> He bindeth up מַ֥יִם <WH4325> the waters בְּעָבָ֑יו <WH5645> in his thick clouds וְלֹא־ <WH3808> does not נִבְקַ֖ע <WH1234> is not rent עָנָ֣ן <WH6051> and the cloud תַּחְתָּֽם׃ <WH8478> under
מְאַחֵ֥ז <WH270> He holdeth back פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> the face כִסֵּ֑ה <WH3678> of his throne פַּרְשֵׁ֖ז <WH6576> [and] spreadeth עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> over עֲנָנֽוֹ׃ <WH6051> his cloud

חֹֽק־ <WH2706> with bounds חָ֭ג <WH2328> He hath compassed עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> the surface מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of the waters עַד־ <WH5704> At תַּכְלִ֖ית <WH8503> come to an end א֣וֹר <WH216> until the day עִם־ <WH5973> with חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> and night
עַמּוּדֵ֣י <WH5982> The pillars שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> of heaven יְרוֹפָ֑פוּ <WH7322> tremble וְ֝יִתְמְה֗וּ <WH8539> and are astonished מִגַּעֲרָתֽוֹ׃ <WH1606> at his reproof

בְּ֭כֹחוֹ <WH3581> with his power רָגַ֣ע <WH7280> He divideth הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> the sea [וּבִתוּבְנָתֹו כ] (וּ֝בִתְבוּנָתֹ֗ו <WH8394> fruit ק) מָ֣חַץ <WH4272> he smiteth רָֽהַב׃ <WH7293> through the proud

בְּ֭רוּחוֹ <WH7307> By his spirit שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> the heavens שִׁפְרָ֑ה <WH8235> he hath garnished חֹֽלֲלָ֥ה <WH2490> has pierced יָ֝ד֗וֹ <WH3027> his hand נָחָ֥שׁ <WH5175> serpent בָּרִֽיחַ׃ <WH1281> the crooked

הֶן־ <WH2005> Behold אֵ֤לֶּה ׀ <WH428> these קְצ֬וֹת <WH7098> Lo these [are] parts [דַּרְכֹּו כ] (דְּרָכָ֗יו <WH1870> along ק) וּמַה־ <WH4100> and how שֵּׁ֣מֶץ <WH8102> but how little דָּ֭בָר <WH1697> a portion נִשְׁמַע־ <WH8085> is heard בּ֑וֹ וְרַ֥עַם <WH7482> of him? but the thunder [גְּבוּרָתֹו כ] (גְּ֝בוּרֹותָ֗יו <WH1369> force ק) מִ֣י <WH4310> who יִתְבּוֹנָֽן׃ <WH995> who can understand ס
